page.title: 01GENERAL INTRODUCTION 1
page.content: Our D block covers much of{East {Edinburgh.}It takes in a large sector of the city's{outer housing areas}_ Duddingston, Craigentinny, and Willowbrae _ and has a resident population of some 35,000. At its centre is{Portobello,}an area of considerable character and local identity reflecting its former status as a separate burgh and its growth in the nineteenth century as a spa and later as a popular{seaside resort.}In the late 1970's parts of Portobello and Duddingston village were designated{Conservation Areas.} Nearly 1/5 of the block is{open space to which there is public access, notably part of{Holyrood Park, Figgate {Burn Park}and various public golf courses. Within the boundaries of this parkland are{Duddingston Loch, {Dunsapie Loch}and the{Figgate Pond.
